title: Preseason Week 3 Takeaways, Betting on the AFC South (Football 8/26)
description:
Gambling Week kicks off on the Pick Six podcast, but before we dive into how to approach betting on the AFC South, Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson break down Week 3 of the preseason and what we were able to learn from this weekend's slate of games. Then, T.A. Cleveland of Sharp Football Analysis joins the pod to dissect how wagers are affected in the wake of Andrew Luck's retirement. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
